name: Heroes Must Die (itch)
description:
You've captured many princesses, and must defend them against the heroes rescuing them while stealing their souls too.

Click on the buttons on the right to buy towers, and place them in the battlefield to fend off the heroes.

A monster themed tower defense game made for Trijam #173 with the theme "You are the Monster"

Credits:

Sofox - Coding

Mutley - Art

Both - Design

Tools used: Godot and Krita
